title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 38.2 - Contents of petition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 38.2 - Contents of petition

State Regulations

The petition shall include the following: (a) The facts called for in subdivisions (f), (g), (h), and (k) of section
37.1
of this Article. (b) Non-operating property and its present
market value. (c) Estimate of the
maximum amount for reorganization costs. (d) Balance sheets for the last five
years. (e) Income statement for the
last five years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
38.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
